name: Writhed Bound
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
--send("outr rope")
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) then
   affstrack.score.bound = 0
   ak.scoreup(matches[2])
end
matches: ([\w'\-]+) has writhed free of [\w'\-]+ entanglement by ropes.
^Gritting [\w'\-]+ glistening teeth into a rictus grin, ([\w'\-]+) emits a low rumble as [\w'\-]+ flexes [\w'\-]+ rippling muscles, bursting the bindings that hold [\w'\-]+\.$
